describe.confidence_note: Clear decomposition into 9 steps; risk flags well-identified; only uncertainty is whether 9 steps is the right granularity

specify.confidence_note: All 16 of 18 findings addressed in rev 1. Phased rollout reduces Phase 1 risk. Detection protocol is concrete and testable. 2 low findings deferred (M5, M7) are genuine deferral not avoidance.

challenge.confidence_note: Revalidation: PASS_WITH_NOTES. 0 critical, 0 high. 2 medium (circuit breaker, agent detection) and 2 low (messaging, install docs) — all non-blocking. All original criticals resolved. Both debate chains converged.

edge_cases.confidence_note: PASS_WITH_NOTES. 23 boundaries analyzed, 0 critical. 4 medium findings (logging, prefix matching, parse errors, agent name handling) — all UX fixes, no architectural changes. Synthesizer correctly recalibrated Stress Tester's over-estimated security risks for markdown-command architecture.

premortem.confidence_note: 6 NEW operational findings, 0 overlap with Stages 3-4. Most impactful: PM-1 (registry staleness timeout cascade) and PM-4 (orphaned registry references). All addressable during implementation without spec regression.

review.skip_reason: Local challenge stages comprehensive: 2 debate chains (6 rounds), 23 boundaries, 6 operational findings, 0 critical. User elected to skip.

test.confidence_note: 68 spec-blind tests generated across 8 categories: registry (10), blueprint (15), review (7), dispatch (9), docs (5), state (4), logging (6), preservation (8), integration (6), edge (10). P0 blockers (14) cover detection and preservation. Some test agent assertions on agent/slot names will need alignment to actual implementation.

execute.confidence_note: All 6 work units complete. W1 (registry) + W1-review (validation gate with live agent probe) sequential, W2/W3/W4 parallel dispatch (3 sonnet agents), W5 (docs) sequential. 14 P0 blocker tests pass structurally. All 11 adversarial implementation notes addressed. Real-world detection verified against installed_plugins.json.

regression_log.reason: 2 critical findings: F1 (detection mechanism undefined), F2 (registry maintenance unsustainable). Both are foundational — every component depends on them.
